        public void onBluetoothConnectionStateChanged(int state)
        Description copied from interface: BluetoothConnectionService.BluetoothConnectionListener
        This method gets called after the state of the bluetooth connection changed.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        state - The new connection state
        See Also:
        BluetoothConnectionService.STATE_NONE, BluetoothConnectionService.STATE_CONNECTING, BluetoothConnectionService.STATE_CONNECTED

                                  java.lang.String address)
        Description copied from interface: BluetoothConnectionService.BluetoothConnectionListener
        This method gets called when a bluetooth connection is successfully established.
        Specified by:
        onBluetoothConnectionConnected in interface BluetoothConnectionService.BluetoothConnectionListener
        Parameters:
        name - The friendly name of the remote device
        address - Its address

      • onBluetoothConnectionFailure

        public void onBluetoothConnectionFailure(int whatFailed)
        Description copied from interface: BluetoothConnectionService.BluetoothConnectionListener
        This method gets called when a connection error occurs.
        Specified by:
        onBluetoothConnectionFailure in interface BluetoothConnectionService.BluetoothConnectionListener
        Parameters:
        whatFailed - Tells you what error occured
        See Also:
        BluetoothConnectionService.FAILURE_CONNECTING_FAILED, BluetoothConnectionService.FAILURE_CONNECTION_LOST, BluetoothConnectionService.FAILURE_WRITE_FAILED

      • onBluetoothConnectionReceive

        public void onBluetoothConnectionReceive(byte[] buffer,
                                int numberOfBytesInBuffer)
        Description copied from interface: BluetoothConnectionService.BluetoothConnectionListener
        When there is (raw) data received over RFCOMM, it will be available through this function.
        Specified by:
        onBluetoothConnectionReceive in interface BluetoothConnectionService.BluetoothConnectionListener
        Parameters:
        buffer - The buffer that holds the received (raw) data
        numberOfBytesInBuffer - The number of valid bytes in that buffer

      • onBluetoothConnectionWrite

        public void onBluetoothConnectionWrite(byte[] buffer)
        Description copied from interface: BluetoothConnectionService.BluetoothConnectionListener
        When you send something to the device (for example, by using the BluetoothConnectionService.write(byte[]) method), this method gets called with the data you sent.
        Specified by:
        onBluetoothConnectionWrite in interface BluetoothConnectionService.BluetoothConnectionListener
        Parameters:
        buffer - The data sent
